title: Vizag Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Fire Officer, Executive Engineer Posts
description: The Visakhapatnam Port Trust (Vizag Port Trust) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Fire Officers and Executive Engineer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, and B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the Vizag Port Trust Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentione...
